#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

struct interval{
int start,finish;
}intrvl[1000000];

bool compare(const interval& a,const interval& b){
return a.finish<b.finish;
}


int main()
{int t,n,i,c,end;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--){
scanf("%d",&n);
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
scanf("%d%d",&intrvl[i].start,&intrvl[i].finish);
sort(intrvl,intrvl+n,&compare);

end=-1;
c=0;
for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        if(intrvl[i].start>=end){
        c++;
        end=intrvl[i].finish;
        }
}
cout<<c<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
